abstract: Mary E. Minnick, will leave the company, a month after the company promoted its international chief, Muhtar Kent, to chief operating officer.
snippet: Mary E. Minnick, will leave the company, a month after the company promoted its international chief, Muhtar Kent, to chief operating officer.
lead_paragraph: The Coca-Cola Company said yesterday that its marketing chief, Mary E. Minnick, would leave the company, a month after the company promoted its international chief, Muhtar Kent, to chief operating officer.
